fullplot: A small-time con-man with passport problems gets mixed up with a gang of world-class jewelry thieves plotting to rob the Topkapi museum in Istanbul. Turkish intelligence, suspecting arms smuggling, gets involved, and under pressure the con-man rises to heights he'd never dreamed of.
plot: Caper film about the theft of a jeweled dagger from an Istanbul museum.
title: Topkapi
writers: Eric Ambler (based on the novel "The Light of Day")
